occupation: Global IT Business Management in US Govt.,
description:
I think, live & look much younger than my chronological age. 
As part of 'Covid reckoning' I am finishing up my US Federal Govt., career n order to travel & live in coastal towns. I am looking forward to using my San Diego, CA townhouse by the ocean as a 'home-base' to spend the best years with a 'sweetheart' (now that I've accumulated enough wealth & wisdom to last a life time in fun & happiness).
